title: Epic Buys Fall Guys - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.02.21
description:
It's a huge Whitta Wednesday on Tuesday! Gary and Greg talk about Epic buying Tonic Games Group, Nick reports in on Aliens: Fireteam, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:07:50 - Housekeeping
On top of that, PSILY is live, it has my Maquette review!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:09:10 - BREAKING: Epic Games is buying Fall Guys developer Mediatonic,
@olgakharif and I have learned. Story hitting shortly
00:20:00 - Aliens: Fireteam Announced
00:32:09 - Harry Potter Game allows Trans Characters, Jason @ Bloomberg
00:44:30 - Why So Many Cutscenes in Outriders? Wesley Yin-Poole @ EuroGamer
00:47:35 -  Ad
00:52:12 - TLOU 2 Cleans Up on BAFTA Noms, Matthew Handrahan @GIB
00:54:00 - Goodbye PlayStation Store Movie and TV purchases, PS Blog
00:55:00 - Layoffs reported at Hardsuit Labs, Marie Dealessandri @ GIB
00:55:35 - SDCC Canceled Again, Shocking No One
01:00:40 - Out today
01:05:20 - Squad Up:Chris(PSN/Xbox) - PSN- twitch373, xbl- Dickybird373
01:05:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tim and Andy
